short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: 备份和恢复 APISIX Dashboard 的配置数据，支持路由、上游、服务和消费者数据。
short.en: Backup and restore APISIX Dashboard configurations. Support routes, upstreams, services, and consumers data.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: 登录apisix dashboard ，使用该工具备份数据，恢复数据。该工具提供详细的备份及恢复进度，一键备份恢复dashboard数据，方便快捷
long.en: Log in to the APISIX Dashboard, and use this tool to backup and restore data. The tool provides detailed backup and restoration progress, offering one-click backup and restoration of dashboard data, convenient and fast.
